title: How to Make a Sugar Plum Fairy Martini

steps.headline: Place a vodka-infused plum on the cutting board.
Use a paring knife to cut the plum in half.
Puree the plum in a blender or food processor.
Fill the cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes.
Pour three quarters of an ounce (20ml) of the puree over the ice, along with the lemon juice and vodka.
Add 1/2 an ounce (15ml) of simple syrup to the shaker if you’re making a sweeter version of this recipe.
Seal the cocktail shaker and shake the drink for 15 to 20 seconds.
Strain your chilled drink into a martini glass.
Garnish it with a lemon peel.

text: Place a vodka-infused plum on the cutting board.  Use a paring knife to cut the plum in half. Remove the stone. Puree the plum in a blender or food processor.  Fill the cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes.  Pour three quarters of an ounce (20ml) of the puree over the ice, along with the lemon juice and vodka.  Add 1/2 an ounce (15ml) of simple syrup to the shaker if you’re making a sweeter version of this recipe.  Seal the cocktail shaker and shake the drink for 15 to 20 seconds.  Strain your chilled drink into a martini glass.  Garnish it with a lemon peel. It's ready to serve.
